ing: 1 cup finely chopped fully cooked ham
des: "Hard-cooked eggs and chopped ham take center stage in these warm sandwiches from Barbara Adams. 'I have relied on this rapid recipe since my mother-in-law shared it with me,' says the North Andover, Massachusetts reader. 'It fits my busy schedule perfectly.'"
ins: In a bowl, combine the ham, cheese, onion, olives and eggs. Stir in chili sauce and mayonnaise. Place about 1/3 cupful in each bun; wrap individually in foil. Place on a baking sheet. Bake at 400 degrees F for 10 minutes or until heated through.
